thread.title: Two Marriott Resorts In Florida Roll Out Packages For Holiday Fun In The Sun
thread.title_full: Two Marriott Resorts In Florida Roll Out Packages For Holiday Fun In The Sun - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Two Marriott Resorts In Florida Roll Out Packages For Holiday Fun In The Sun
text:
Fort Lauderdale Marriott Pompano Beach Resort & Spa; Palm Beach Marriott Singer Island Beach Resort & Spa
Fort Lauderdale and Palm Beach hotels offer deluxe accommodations, other perks to spur travel in November and December
BETHESDA, Md. , Sept. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Trade garland for palm trees and snow-covered hills for white sand beaches with a holiday retreat to two of Florida's premier resort destinations.
Fort Lauderdale Marriott Pompano Beach Resort & Spa and Palm Beach Marriott Singer Island Beach Resort & Spa have teed up holiday packages that blend easy beach living with holiday spirit.
Set in the up-and-coming Pompano Beach area in Fort Lauderdale , the boutique-style Marriott Pompano Beach evokes the simple pleasures of Florida beach living, making for a charming holiday escape with the comforts of home. Available for stays Nov. 1, 2015 to Jan. 2, 2016 , the Home Away From Home For The Holidays Package includes overnight accommodations based on a two-night minimum stay, daily buffet breakfast at McCoy's Oceanfront, a gingerbread house kit for family fun, Kids Club access for one-half day for up to two children, 15 percent discount on all treatments at SiSpa, and a Shopper's Savings Book courtesy of The Galleria Mall in Fort Lauderdale . Rates start at just $199 per night. For reservations at the Pompano Beach resort, call 1-954-782-0100 or visit www.PompanoMarriott.com .
Perched on a stretch of palm-fringed sand on a private beach, the AAA Four Diamond all-suite Palm Beach Marriott Singer Island's Holiday Retreat Package provides families with a luxurious getaway to Florida's famed Gold Coast from Nov. 1 to Dec. 26, 2015 . Complete with accommodations in a well-appointed suite with a full kitchen, the package also includes a $50 gift certificate to use at the Singer Island resort's award-winning seaside sanctuary, SiSpa, Kids Club access for one-half day for up to two children, a complimentary beach setup for one full day (two beach chairs and one umbrella) and a welcome amenity. Rates start at just $359 per night and require a two-night minimum stay. For reservations, call 1-561-340-1700 or visit www.PalmBeachMarriottResort.com .
About Fort Lauderdale Marriott Pompano Beach Resort & Spa
Fort Lauderdale Marriott Pompano Beach Resort & Spa at 1200 N. Ocean Blvd. in Pompano Beach, FL is located steps from the shore in Pompano Beach , a city ripe for discovery and recently named one of the top 10 "up-and-coming" U.S. destinations by TripAdvisor. Guests can enjoy fresh local fare and speakeasy-style drinks at McCoy's Oceanfront, sea-inspired treatments at SiSpa, poolside relaxation and an array of water sports. Private balconies with Atlantic Ocean views are afforded in all 194 guest rooms and 25 suites. The resort is managed by Urgo Hotels and Resorts . For information, visit www.PompanoMarriott.com , call 1-954-782-0100 or connect via Facebook and Twitter .
About Palm Beach Marriott Singer Island Beach Resort & Spa
Rising 21 stories above a beautiful stretch of palm-fringed sand, Palm Beach Marriott Singer Island Beach Resort & Spa at 3800 N. Ocean Drive on Singer Island in Riviera Beach, FL is the only all-suite beachfront property in Palm Beach County . Each of its 193 suites offers spacious and stylish condo-style living. Dining choices range from exceptional American regional cuisine to casual Caribbean fare. The resort's award-winning SiSpa offers sea-inspired pampering and wellness therapies, while its boutique-style meeting space beautifully accommodates high-powered conferences, exquisite beach weddings and sophisticated social events. The resort is managed by Urgo Hotels and Resorts . For information, visit www.PalmBeachMarriottResort.com , call 1-561-340-1700 or connect via Facebook and Twitter .
